meaningMnemonic: You've seen the word 使う hopefully by now. If you have, you know it means "to use." So, the <kanji>way</kanji> to <kanji>use</kanji> something is the <vocabulary>way of using</vocabulary> (aka <vocabulary>how to use</vocabulary>). This will be a word you see when you're looking at directions for how to use something.
readingMnemonic: This uses the kun'yomi readings from the vocab words 使う and 方. So as long as you're okay with those, you can apply that knowledge over here.
